QuestData.Title: Anything We Can Get
QuestData.Description: Stay back and forge more weapons? Pah! A Forgehammer has ne'er been afraid of battle! Who needs the safety of home to make weapons? Besides - there is oodles of raw material out here. Those Dragonmaw weapons are worthless, but they can be smelted down to make actual weapons. Bring me 8 Dragonmaw weapons so me daughter and I can forge real weapons out of them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 Dragonmaw weapons to Brom Forgehammer at Gorshak War Camp.
QuestData.CompletionText: How many have you got so far?
QuestData.RewardText: Yer a good $glad:lass;. Have me thanks and a little gold for yer troubles.
